pageContent: Introduction: Lower urinary tract symptoms (LUTS) and erectile dysfunction (ED) are common problems in middle-aged and older men. Recently, epidemiologic studies have shown significant associations between severity of LUTS and male sexual dysfunction.

metaData.source:
Management of Climacturia During Inflatable Penile Prosthesis Surgery
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30806828/
